sn36.20:1.1: “Dvepi maya, bhikkhave, vedana vutta pariyayena, tissopi maya vedana vutta pariyayena, pancapi maya vedana vutta pariyayena, chapi maya vedana vutta pariyayena, attharasapi maya vedana vutta pariyayena, chattimsapi maya vedana vutta pariyayena, atthasatampi maya vedana vutta pariyayena.
sn36.20:1.3: Evam pariyayadesite kho, bhikkhave, maya dhamme ye annamannassa subhasitam sulapitam na samanumannissanti, na samanujanissanti, na samanumodissanti, tesam etam patikankham—bhandanajata kalahajata vivadapanna annamannam mukhasattihi vitudanta viharissantiti.
sn36.20:1.5: Evam pariyayadesite kho, bhikkhave, maya dhamme ye annamannassa subhasitam sulapitam samanumannissanti samanujanissanti samanumodissanti, tesam etam patikankham—samagga sammodamana avivadamana khirodakibhuta annamannam piyacakkhuhi sampassanta viharissantiti.
sn36.20:2.2: thanam kho panetam, bhikkhave, vijjati yam annatitthiya paribbajaka evam vadeyyum:
sn36.20:2.3: ‘sannavedayitanirodham samano gotamo aha, tanca sukhasmim pannapeti.
sn36.20:2.5: Evamvadino, bhikkhave, annatitthiya paribbajaka evamassu vacaniya:
sn36.20:2.6: ‘na kho, avuso, bhagava sukhanneva vedanam sandhaya sukhasmim pannapeti.
sn36.20:2.7: Yattha yattha, avuso, sukham upalabbhati yahim yahim, tam tam tathagato sukhasmim pannapeti’”ti.
